name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: League of Legends Miss Fortune Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sail into battle with Miss Fortune's bold visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Command the high seas with the fierce and stunning Miss Fortune-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A bold and captivating interface inspired by Miss Fortune’s deadly charm and maritime flair.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that mirrors Miss Fortune’s elegance and precision.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Miss Fortune-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as sharp and powerful as Miss Fortune’s aim.
